amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert provisions which clarify that if the Administrator should determine that there was a compelling reason to extend the compliance date, such an extension could in no case go beyond the date which is 5 years after the effective date of such regulation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to establish a date for compliance with standards and requirements in accordance with the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 257 (Roll no. 761).
